summary: Based on real events, this film depicts the story of a school for the hearing-impaired where young deaf students were sexually assaulted by the faculty members over a long period of time.
cast: Yoo Gong|Jung Yu-mi|Hyeon-soo Kim|Jee-Young Kim|In-seo Jeong|Seung-hwan Baek|Hye-jin Park|Gwang Jang|Ji-seong Eom|Jeon Gook-Hwan|Jae-Ho Heo|Seok-yeon Hong|Eom Hyo-Seob|Choi Jin-ho|Joo-ryeong Kim|Min-Sang Kim|Hyun-sung Lim|Myung-Ryul Nam|Jang So-Yeon|Kwon Yoo-Jin
title: Do-ga-ni
